original_text: And whereas they commanded to leave the stump of the tree roots; thy kingdom shall be sure unto thee, after that thou shalt have known that the heavens do rule.
korean_text: 또 그들이 그 나무뿌리의 그루터기를 남겨 두라 하였은즉 하나님이 다스리시는 줄을 왕이 깨달은 후에야 왕의 나라가 견고하리이다

sentences.original_text: to leave the stump of the tree roots
thy kingdom shall be sure unto thee
after that thou shalt have known
